turn.1: What happened in the 2012 Summer Paralympics ?
turn.2: Cycling at the 2012 Summer Paralympics – Men's road race  The men's road race cycling events at the 2012 Summer Paralympics took place on 6–8 September at Brands Hatch.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Cyclists are given a classification depending on the type and extent of their disability.
turn.5: What do they do after they are classified?
turn.6: The classification system allows cyclists to compete against others with a similar level of function.
turn.8: The class number indicates the severity of impairment with "1" being most impaired.
